sense.name: The physical act of following in an effort to overtake or capture.
sense.examples: The culprit ran and the cop took off in pursuit. Anything is justified in the pursuit of a fleeing criminal.

sense.name: An activity that occupies one's time and focus.
sense.examples: His pursuit of his dreams was admirable. Piano and violin are just two of her pursuits. They criticized the boy for his limited pursuits.
